content: Another linter question (I'm not very good at these). It looks to me like Jon has written a clever linter to check something which we probably want to check for, but my guess is that every linter comes with a cost. Do we want to pay this cost?
Maybe we could run such linters once a week and post a warning somewhere?
This is indeed another good example of a "periodic clean up linter".
See #PR reviews > #17580 lint declarations which contain a double underscore @ ðŸ’¬ for the other recent mention (by me!).

So I'm still a bit unclear about what's happening for this PR. Do we want to merge this or not? Sorry for being so dense, this is not at all my area of expertise but it's come up again in the weekly triage meeting.
